source.name: Energy Efficiency Programs and Estimated Energy Savings
source.description: The Energy Efficiency Portfolio Standard (EEPS) Program encourages cost-effective electric and natural gas energy efficiency across New York State.  New York State’s utilities and the New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA) administer energy efficiency programs to achieve energy efficiency savings. This data includes the list of energy efficiency programs and the estimated energy savings reported for each program.
